thread.title: Pixar blew our minds again by revealing even more movie Easter eggs (34 Photos)
thread.title_full: Pixar blew our minds again by revealing even more movie Easter eggs (34 Photos)

author: Shelbie
title: Pixar blew our minds again by revealing even more movie Easter eggs (34 Photos)
text:
Oh yeah, remember Lightning McQueen? 17 
So do the kids from Toy Story 3 … 18 
…because they play with him all the time. 19 
Ugh and they play with this asshole, but he must have gotten off the grill of that truck he was stuck on at the end of the movie, because someone else played with him as well. 20 
See? Here he (or another Lots-o’-Huggin’ Bear, at the very least) is hanging out with this girl from Up. Advertisement Advertisement 21 
I think we can all agree, however, that Dug from Up is easily one of the best characters. 22 
So maybe that’s why they (kind of) used him in Ratatouille. 23 
Also in Ratatouille, Chef Skinner goes on a crazy chase through the streets on his moped. 24 
That moped ends up in a dump in Wall-E . 25 
But wait, there’s more from Ratatouille! Remember the famous Gusteau’s? Advertisement
